name: Spectra
description: Spectra is an oscilloscope-themed robot with the ability to analyze and display electrical waveforms. Its box-shaped body resembles that of a soldier, while its arms and legs have a feline design. The screen, positioned on its chest, also features a cat-like appearance. Spectra is equipped with a pair of stylish glasses, enhancing its visual capabilities and giving it a touch of sophistication. It is a proud member of the WebtrES club, a community of technologically advanced robots.
